name: 3D6
description:
Shoot, slash, and dodge away from hordes of dice. What class will you roll!?

Roll with the punches and do the best with whatever class you're given. Before you know it you'll be rolling for a new one. Defeat the hordes by tactfully using your randomly assigned class to take down enemies before you get a new class. Constantly chaotic you'll have to stay on your toes and deal with whatever you roll.

Tip: Be sure to use your secondary ability, they tend to be movement abilities!

Controls:

Right Mouse Button - Primary Fire

Left Mouse Button - Secondary

Mouse - Rotate

WASD - Move

**HEADPHONE WARNING**

Designed for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam by Andrew, Jamie, Peter, and Rafe.
